title: Bao Shou Lieren
synopsis: In the distant ancient times, there were four mysterious continents outside of human civilization. Here, people and the Explosive Beast Dragon Egg live in peace...Until one day, the Ice and Snow Tribe tried to use the power of the Dragon Egg to dominate the world and attracted three other tribes to fight together. In the end, four continents were hit hard and fell into a deep sleep... Thousands of years have passed in a flash. Zhang Tianhao is a descendant of the Tornado tribe. By coincidence, he met the Explosive Beast Dragon Egg left over from ancient times and got to know the descendants of other tribes. They are like-minded and work together to stop the conspiracy of Mu Fei, the inheritor of the Ice and Snow Tribe. The gorgeous and exciting adventure begins here! (translated from youku)
